Crown Prosecution Service said it would re-examine material collected by police officers who investigated allegations that journalists at the newspaper illegally accessed the voicemail of several public figures. Keir Starmer , the Director of Public Prosecutions, announced a comprehensive assessment of all material in the possession of the Metropolitan Police Service relating to phone hacking. The allegations concern the behaviour of journalists during the time that Mr Andy Coulson was editor of the newspaper. Will he continue to draw lines in the sand far to the left of the electorate or is he going to lurch to the middle the way Bill Clinton did to see if he can come back? The State of the Union is the kickoff of his re-election campaign.
